title: What is technology in ICT? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology in ICT is pretty straightforward, your smartphone, laptop, PC, anything really that now computes data is considered technology within ICT. There’s things such as the cloud now which gives banks and other companies the ability store sensitive information such as banking details in a secure place online. More and more things change every day too.
It’s the T, the I stand for information and the C stands for communication. The full meaning is information and communication technologies
